Disabilities
lead_paragraph: Frank Kineavy and Nick Gaynor are managers for the Villanova men’s and women’s basketball teams, respectively. Both perform those jobs in wheelchairs, because both have cerebral palsy.
snippet: Frank Kineavy and Nick Gaynor are managers for the Villanova men’s and women’s basketball teams, respectively. Both perform those jobs in wheelchairs, because both have cerebral palsy.
